description: Young Dons survive Brora test after spot kicks
title: Young Dons survive Brora test after spot kicks
title_page: Young Dons survive Brora test after spot kicks - BBC Sport
maintext:
Aberdeen B squeezed past Highland League hosts Brora Rangers in the first round north of the SPFL Trust Trophy following a penalty shoot-out.
Forward Jordan MacRae gave Brora a 28th-minute lead, but visiting striker Alfie Bavidge forced a shoot-out with an equaliser eight minutes from time.
The young Dons prevailed 4-2 from the penalty spot to set up a home derby against League 2 side Peterhead on 15/16 August.
